text: how often do you guys replace your tires?
i’ve never replaced mine, but that’s probably not a good thing. But my bike is only 2 years old.

yeah, mines about two years old now. my commute isn’t very long, so I didn’t think I’d have to change it very often. But the tread on my back tire is getting smooth and I got a flat the other day which left a noticeable hole.
It depends but it sounds like you may need to replace it.
I would take it to the bike store and ask them.
if there’s a noticeable hole, then I’d definitely replace <@U0261PCRQ>
I put new ones on every season for my roadie, but I easily put on 2K mi/year
and they’re pretty slick to start with

Last time I took my bike in the guy at the shop told me about every 2 years I should replace tires if I'm riding pretty frequently. Of course I'm still riding with one tire that's at least 6 years old...
